name: Design Your Own Apron
description:
The Pretty Pickle is proud to announce a new option for Aprons! 

Design your own, fully reversible apron!

These Aprons are made with my own custom created pattern, made to fit and flatter all body types. They hug all the right curves, while hiding all the wrong ones=). 

Makes a GREAT gift for everyone!

Features:

~Scoop Neck
~Full length
~Reversible
~Large pockets on both sides
~Washable 100% cotton
~Long ties to wrap around front, or tie in back.
~Adjustable neck tie for all body types.
~Top Stitched for durability and professional look.

All you need to do is to choose two patterns/colors from the first two photos.
When checking out, just let me know which patterns/colors you prefer. 

If you would like custom embroidery on both (or one) sides, please see my product page to add that on to your order. Embroidery is $5 extra. I can do most anything in embroidery. Popular options are monograms, initials, animals, and phrases. 

Find listing here: 

http://theprettypickle.bigcartel.com/product/embroidery-add-on

Please allow 1-2 weeks as this handmade item is made to order. 




Any questions, comments, or suggestions, please feel free to contact me! 

Don't see what you want? I LOVE doing custom work for my customers, all ya gotta do it ask!

name: Yellow Houndstooth Earrings
description:
The fabric used in these studs is a bright yellow houndstooth.
Perfect for a punch of color. Looks awesome with a bright blue, grey, red, etc.


These are a 1/2 in. diameter (the smallest available), which most people prefer in size. 




My gift to you:
Each pair of earrings comes on a pretty pickle card, inside a cute box, perfect for gift giving!

name: All American Apron
description:
This patriotic full reversible apron is made with a fun picnic/american print on one side and an American flag and fireworks print on the other. Perfect for the 4th of July, or anytime you are feeling extra patriotic! 100%cotton means wearable and washable!


Each side has a large pocket for holding all of your kitchen gadgets and/or gardening tools.

Ties in the back are made long enough to tie in the front if desired. Ties around the neck as well.
All seams are topstitched for a more finished look.

Made with my own pattern that I designed myself! 

One Size Fits All.

name: Love Earrings
description:
These studs feature a beautiful red heart on a white background fabric. 

These are a 1/2 in. diameter (the smallest size available), which most people prefer in size. 




They are very light in weight, so don't be surprised when you forget you are wearing them! 
Several people who own my earrings have said they are great for their sensitive ears. No irritation at all! 


My gift to you:
Each pair of earrings comes on a pretty pickle card, inside a cute box, perfect for gift giving!

I can also ship this as a gift, directly to the person you choose in a PrettyPickle box with tissue and ribbon. Just add a note in the purchase form.



Need a more custom look? Just convo me and I'd be glad to assist you! 

Love your studs.

name: Black and White Houndstooth Earring Studs
description:
Black and White Houndstooth 1/2 diameter earring studs.

These are a classic!! Great texture from the woven fabric, yet simple classic look. 


Love your studs.

Each pair of earrings comes on a pretty pickle card, inside a cute box, perfect for gift giving!

The PrettyPickle card will vary because this item is custom made. 




Need a more custom look? Just convo me and I'd be glad to assist you!
